title: Parallel Argumentation Design Microlearning Course for Developing Scientific Argumentation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic genetics and scientific research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Online collaborative environment using digital devices and a project-based assessment system

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the structure of scientific arguments (claim-evidence-counterargument) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can collaboratively write argumentative essays incorporating at least three counterarguments with peers
Learners can improve argumentation skills by over 15% based on discussion data from digital platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
